name: Task-Operation Status Report
query:
SELECT 
`tabTask`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:300",
`tabProject`.`name` as "Project:Link/Project:300",
`tabTask`.`subject` as "Subject::200",
`tabTask`.`name` as "ID:Link/Task:100",
`tabTask`.`territory` as "Territory::80",
`tabTask`.`status` as "Status::120",
`tabTask`.`operation_status` as "Operation Status::120",
DATEDIFF( curdate(),`tabTask`.exp_start_date) as "Age::80",
`tabTask`.`r1_count` as "V#::80",
`tabTask`.`proposition` as "P#::80",
`tabTask`.`pending_profiles_to_send` as "PS#::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Linedup',"Submitted","shortlisted","Interviewed")
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "PR#::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Sourced')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "Sourced::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Submitted')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "Submitted::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Shortlisted')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "Shortlisted::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Linedup')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "Linedup::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Interviewed')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "Interviewed::80",
(SELECT count(*)
 FROM 
 `tabCandidate`
WHERE
`tabCandidate`.pending_for in ('Proposed PSL')
AND
`tabCandidate`.task = `tabTask`.name
) AS "CL#::80",
`tabTask`.`project_manager` as "Project Manager::200"
FROM 
`tabProject`
Left Join `tabTask` ON `tabProject`.name =`tabTask`.project
Left Join `tabDirect Interview Details` ON `tabProject`.name =`tabDirect Interview Details`.parent
WHERE
`tabProject`.department in ('Sourcing - VHRS')
and
`tabTask`.`status` in ('Open','Overdue','Pending Review','working')
ORDER BY
`tabProject`.customer,`tabProject`.name
